actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: Resolution of inquiry on the incarceration of certain prisoners.

summary.text: Directs the Attorney General to furnish the House of Representatives with all the following facts within ten days after the adoption of this resolution: (1) the complete record of the Department of Justice which led to the determination of the venue in the Northern District of Texas of the present grand jury investigation before which Kenneth Tierney, Thomas Laffey, Matthias Reilly, Paschal Morahan, and Daniel Crawford have been summoned; (2) a listing of any other districts in which the said grand jury investigation might have been conducted, together with the basis of venue for each such district; and (3) whether the said grand jury investigation has been completed, and, if not, when it is scheduled to be completed.

titles.title: Resolution of inquiry on the incarceration of certain prisoners.
